person.content:

| --- |

Explanation:

The scorers for Dundee United are mentioned as "Olafsson 22" and "Olafsson 51", indicating that a player named Olafsson scored two goals in the 22nd and 51st minutes of the match. Therefore, the person entity in this paragraph is "Olafsson".
